content: By: Amanda Milligan October 6, 2020 3 Digital PR Tenets for Excellent Outreach Content Marketing | Link Building | Public Relations How are the experts at Fractl able to secure media coverage on sites like CNBC, USA Today, and more? It takes a lot of time and resources, and adherence a set of tenets that guide their digital PR process. Amanda Milligan shares those tenets in this post, to help you finesse your own outreach strategies. Read this post By: Amanda Milligan July 27, 2020 The Real Short-Term and Long-Term Results of Content Marketing and Digital PR Public Relations | Content Marketing Sure, everyone wants links now, but where does the real growth come in, and how long does it take? People want to know what wins they can report on to their superiors, even in the short-term. There are so many benefits to a combination of content marketing and digital PR, and Amanda walks through what you can realistically expect. Read this post By: Kristin Tynski January 20, 2020 The True Value of Top Publisher Links Link Building | Public Relations Which top-tier publishers link out the most, and which confer the most value? Kristin Tynski analyzes the data. Read this post By: Kristin Tynski December 10, 2019 Becoming an Industry Thought Leader: Advanced Techniques for Finding the Best Places to Pitch Guest Posts Content Marketing | Public Relations If you’re involved in any kind of digital PR, you know how hard it can be to find a good home for your content. In this post, learn how to identify the best, highest ROI publishers for building consistent, mutually beneficial guest posting relationships with. Read this post By: Rand Fishkin June 21, 2019 The Easiest PR-Focused Link Building Tip in the Book Link Building | Whiteboard Friday | Public Relations Focused on new link acquisition for your clients or company? Link building is always a slog, but Rand has a PR-focused tip that makes it much easier to find people and publications that'll cover and amplify you. Check it out in this week's edition of Whiteboard Friday! Read this post By: Ashley Carlisle February 4, 2019 How to Set Up Metrics to Optimize Your Digital PR Team’s Press Coverage Content Marketing | SEO Analytics | Public Relations What metrics are indicative of success in digital PR? Learn how to better define measurable KPIs for your online press coverage in this article. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis May 3, 2017 Offline & Organic: The Two Rivers That Feed Modern Local SEO Local SEO | Advanced SEO | Public Relations When the local SEO industry is in the midst of a sea change & Google's willing to change the rules at a moment's notice, your best bet is to safeguard your efforts with an offline and organic approach. Read this post By: Ronell Smith January 30, 2017 Why You Should Steal My Daughter's Playbook for Effective Email Outreach Link Building | Email Marketing | Public Relations If effective email outreach is core element of successful online marketing, it's time we stepped up our game and made the needs of others—not the needs of our brands—the priority. Read this post By: Simon Penson January 16, 2017 Programmatic Delivery: The Future of Content Marketing and Promotion? Content Marketing | Online Advertising | Public Relations Could programmatic delivery be the answer to the challenges of content distribution and promotion in the future? Simon Penson thinks so. Read on to discover how this new method of paid content delivery could help you. Read this post By: Cosette Jarrett May 11, 2016 36 Authoritative Outreach Tips for Digital PR Specialists Link Building | Public Relations Sometimes the qualities of a digital PR specialist don’t seem to differ much from those of a skilled stalker. In this post, Cosette Jarrett offers a comprehensive list of ideas and tools you can use to help suss out contact info and create pitches tailor-made for their recipients. Read this post By: Simon Penson March 24, 2016 The Brand as Publisher Masterplan - Reinventing Content Marketing for the Next Decade Content Marketing | Blogging | Public Relations Content marketing is big business, but are brands taking it far enough? Here Simon Penson argues that Brand as Publisher is the next step. Read this post By: Samuel Scott March 8, 2016 The Advanced Guide to Online Publicity Campaigns Link Building | Branding | Public Relations Without a doubt, the most entertaining guide to publicity campaigns you'll ever read. You'll laugh, you'll cry, you'll realize this is what you've been doing (or should've been doing) all along. In today's comprehensive post, Samuel Scott outlines the tactics every marketer can and should be following to success — online, offline, or both. Read this post By: Kelsey Libert February 25, 2016 Is Any Press Good Press? Measuring the SEO Impact of PR Wins and Fails Link Building | SEO Basics | Public Relations From the 5,000% drug price increase to the debate over "The Dress," everyone's heard about these 7 wild PR stunts. But have you wondered what their SEO impact was? Kelsey Libert of Fractl shares insights gained from researching the effect of PR events on a site's organic traffic and backlinks. Read this post By: Tom Mcloughlin January 14, 2016 Case Study: How We Gained More than 100 Links for a Travel Website via Content Marketing Content Marketing | Link Building | Public Relations Many small businesses see content marketing as something that you can only be successful with if you are a huge company with a big budget. After being in the same boat for a long time, Tom Mcloughlin shares his agency's experience with running a successful campaign from start to finish, with excellent results. Read this post
